title: Update header styling, filter office options by selected category, and add Category column to documents table

requirements.text: Update the application header on every page to use background color #0B2554 and display the title text "Dr Sudhir Dhone" at the top of the page (in the header). Ensure the header text/icons remain readable against this new background color.

quotes: use colour #0B2554 for header Add a title Dr Sudhir Dhone on top of page

acceptanceCriteria: On all routes/pages wrapped by the main layout, the header background color is exactly #0B2554.
The text "Dr Sudhir Dhone" is visible in the header on every page.
Header navigation items and icons remain readable with sufficient contrast on the new header background color.

requirements.text: In the Documents list page filters, make the Office dropdown options depend on the selected Category dropdown value so that only offices belonging to the selected category are shown. When no category is selected (All categories), show offices across all categories. If the user changes the selected category and the currently selected office is not valid for the new category, clear the Office selection.

quotes: offices only from selected category should be visible offices from other categories should not be visible
category is selected through the dropdown filter.

acceptanceCriteria: Selecting a Category filters the Office dropdown list to only offices for that category.
When Category is set to All categories, the Office dropdown list contains offices across categories (not just one category).
If an Office is selected and the user changes Category such that the selected Office is no longer in the available options, the Office filter is reset to All offices.
No offices from non-selected categories are shown in the Office dropdown when a specific category is selected.

requirements.text: Add a new "Category" column to the existing Documents table shown below the filters on the Documents list page, and render each document’s category label in that column using the app’s category label mapping.

quotes: category should be listed on document list details
list of all documents below filters category section should be added in table

acceptanceCriteria: The documents table includes a visible "Category" header/column without removing existing columns.
Each row displays the document’s category as a human-readable label (e.g., "Nursing Institute"), consistent with the existing category label helper.
The table layout remains usable on smaller screens (horizontal scroll behavior continues to work).

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui (compose these components instead).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (backend/main.mo).
Use English for all user-facing text added/changed.
nonGoals: Do not introduce new authentication providers beyond Internet Identity.
Do not add new backend endpoints unless strictly necessary for the requested UI behavior.
Do not redesign unrelated pages or change document filtering semantics beyond the requested office-by-category visibility in the Office dropdown.
